themes: complexity of sustaining an arts career
key_phrases: juggle running a studio, releasing music, gigging 4 days a week
prepping for gigs, learning music, practicing my instrument
making the industry hang, attempt to apply for grants
music and the arts unfortunately isn’t a normal business
it’s a more than a full time job, it’s a lifestyle choice
barriers_identified: difficulty finding time to apply for grants
arts work not fitting standard business models
